My good friend highly recommended Ms Pearl when I was looking for a piano teacher for my 3 year old daughter. Ms Pearl has been teaching my friends‚Äô three boys for years, now aged 8, 6 and 4!

Ms Pearl is an amazing piano teacher. She is dedicated, nurturing, patient, talented and skilled in keeping my young daughter engaged throughout the entire duration of class. My daughter loves Ms Pearl and enjoys her weekly piano lessons!

I highly recommend Ms Pearl. You do not have to worry about young kids‚Äô attention span for piano lessons as Ms Pearl is experienced and can improvise and keep children engaged and cultivate their passion for music! :)

Teacher Pearl was super interactive and engaging! My soon to be 6mnths daughter was reluctant but seeing her interactions made her comfortable to join the class! Thank you for bringing confidence to my baby through music ü§ç

We sent our 3yr old son & 1yr old daughter to the trial class and they enjoyed it very much. Pearl(teacher) reminds us of the YouTuber Ms Rachel. Your child will instantly love her as much as our kids does. We're sold!
Teacher Pearl is kind, friendly and patient to the student. She is good at assessing student's abilities and interests. She adjusting the lessons accordingly to makes the lessons fun and challenging.
Amazing and attentive teacher. The kiddos were very happy and enthusiastic during her class.
